ModMetaData.name: Dub's Heat Pumps
ModMetaData.author: Sh0tybumbati
ModMetaData.description:
Adds heat pumps to Dub's Bad Hygiene climate control system. These advanced split-type air conditioners automatically switch between heating and cooling modes based on room temperature, providing year-round climate control.
Features: - Split-type heat pump system with indoor and outdoor units - Automatic mode switching between heating and cooling - Efficient temperature regulation within threshold ranges - Seamlessly integrates with Dub's Bad Hygiene HVAC system
Requires Dub's Bad Hygiene to function.
